INSERT INTO MOOD(no) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(NO), 0) FROM BOARD))
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.*,ROWNUM AS R FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY NO DESC) B)
WHERE R >= #{startRow} AND R <= #{endRow}
